content.en_US: Cartridge with extra high powder load using a starmetal projectile. The density and stability of starmetal ensures that this projectile can punch through most armors, at the cost of the gun wearing ten times faster. Can only be used in anti-materiel rifles, as the chamber pressure is so high, it would blow automatic weapons apart.
content.zh_CN: 星辉制成的弹药，同时具有非常高的装药量。星辉金属的密度和稳定性确保了 星辉弹药能够击穿大多数装甲，然而这种弹药会使枪械的磨损速度达到原来的 十倍。由于弹仓压力过大，其会直接损毁掉自动武器，因此只能用于反器材步枪。
